summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Pro Diamond Microdermabrasion Handheld DermaBraze MD System 3 Tips, 4 Power Levels, Exfoliates & Resurfaces Skin, Pore Vacuum Extraction for Healthy Skin. Crystal Free, Blemish Reduction, Anti-Aging Review Date: 2016/11/11 Store: Bright Therapy Product Description: ['REDUCE FINE LINES & WRINKLES. The Cosmetic Company Diamond Microdermabrasion is a spa-grade microdermabrasion beauty device that will QUICKLY and EFFECTIVELY reduce & eliminate wrinkles and fine lines, reduce age or liver spots, eliminate acne scars, reverse sun damage and so much more. PRO LEVEL DIAMOND TIP DERMABRASION. The DUAL ACTION EXFOLIATION EXTRACTION method utilizes a diamond tip for abrasion and a vacuum motor to suction out sebum, dead skin cells, dirt, blackheads and whiteheads from your pores. This tool has different speeds so that you can adjust the suction for different areas of your face or body to achieve maximum results. PORTABLE & RECHARGABLE includes 4 TIPS. Standard Diamond tip, Sensitive Diamond Tip, Precision Diamond Tip and Body Tip.This lightweight portable non-invasive aesthetic treatment will GENTLY remove skin debris, imperfections, blemishes, and uneven skin pigmentation by safely EXFOLIATING your face and body. The result will be healthy, beautiful, glowing new skin. 60 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. BUY WITH CONFIDENCE backed by The Cosmetic Company 60 Day Money Back Guarantee - and Full 1 Year Warranty EASY TO USE. 4 POWER LEVELS. Skin will feel REFRESHED as creams and serums are INFUSED deep into the skin - Maximize the effectiveness of your daily skin care regimen by increasing absorption. Use of this machine combined with skin care products will help to RESTORE cell activity, replenish nutrients and promote skin health.'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'Bright Therapy', 'Item Weight': '0.38 Pounds', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.5 x 8 inches; 6.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BT-DermaBrazeMD', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '852661523172', 'Manufacturer': 'The Cosmetic Company'} Review Text: *UPDATE* April 18th, 2017 - I was just browsing the net trying to find a light therapy device and I was getting pretty exasperated with too many choices. I happened to look over and see my Dermabraze MD unit on my vanity and thought, I wonder if their company makes other products? So when I Google'd the company one of the first things I saw was a "Fakespot" link, and having only ever seen products with an F rating I thought I'd check this one because I expected it to have rave reviews like mine. I was FLOORED when I saw the grade F! That simply cannot be accurate! I purchased mine in November of 2016, and nearly 6 months later I still regard it as the best money I've ever spent on skincare, PERIOD. I used it on my full face just last night! It gets a regular workout too, between myself, my mother and my daughter. Even my son has used it! I just had to come update my review when I saw that deceitful grade but in a way I'm thankful because I know now that Fakespot can't be trusted. I KNOW THIS DEVICE WORKS AND WORKS FANTASTICALLY!

I'm fortunate to have had a great example when I was a child. My mother always took very good care of her skin. Until I reached my teen years I literally believed that all women used peel off masks, apricot scrub, Noxema and Oil of Olay, lol. Skin care has come a long way, and when I started working in the beauty industry I was introduced to higher quality products and left my mother's favorites in the dust, haha. As far as exfoliating, before trying this machine I'd always stuck with scrubs, chemical exfoliants and microdermabrasion crystal creams. Now I feel like a need a good kick in the rear for not investing in real microdermabrasion years ago! I absolutely love this machine ... it is an investment, but the effectiveness and sheer convenience of it make it more than worth the money. You just can't get results like this with any other method. My favorite thing about it is the suction. Sure, you can use products to manually exfoliate skin, but vacuuming the oil and dead cells that collect inside and clog pores combined with abrasion literally and immediately take years off the skin's appearance. It also allows the high dollar serums and moisturizers we apply to do a much better job. Again, to me this totally justifies the investment. If you're serious about skin care and spend good money on expensive products, you owe it to yourself to prep your skin so your products can do their jobs!

Pros of the Bright Therapy unit:

Rechargeable
Strong, adjustable suction
Different attachments for heavy, light and acute abrasion.
Comfortable to hold, fit's easily in the hand
Has disposable filters allowing you to see exactly what the machine removes every time you use it.

If you're looking for a great quality microdermabrasion system I think you'll be pleased with this one, I can't find a single con to owning it. I absolutely love mine! Review Title: I really can't say enough good things about this machine! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bamboo Serum by Elements of Beauty (1 oz) - Skin Firming Treatment Helps Tighten Sagging Skin - Anti-Wrinkle Serum Locks in Moisture - With Vitamin C, CoQ10 and Coconut Review Date: 2017/01/30 Store: Elements of Beauty Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Brand': 'Elements of Beauty', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.65 x 1.6 inches; 3.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038006632'} Review Text: Leaves my skin soft and smooth, has a lovely scent too, reminds me of Sweetgrass :) Very light and absorbs quickly, not the tiniest bit greasy. VERY nice serum I would highly recommend to anyone! Review Title: Lovely! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Menthol Rosehip Gel Mask by Eva Naturals - Peppermint Oil, Vitamin C - Organic Skin Care - Best Facial Mask Moisturizer - Pore Minimizer - Prevents Wrinkles & Fine Lines Review Date: 2017/03/20 Store: ATOPAL Average Rating: 2.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ATOPAL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Sensitive, Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 3 x 2 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437716970'} Review Text: I adore masking! I have combination oily skin prone to blackheads, and while I love a good clay or peel off mask, this one was a refreshing change. Way more rose than menthol, it leaves my skin feeling revitalized and soothed rather than stripped. I definitely recommend it! Review Title: A nice change from the norm! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ladykin Fresh Mango Icing Gel Bar. Instantly cools and refreshes pores with its sweet 90% pure Mango Extract. Korean Skin Care. 6.76 fl oz Review Date: 2017/05/11 Store: Ladykin Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ladykin', 'Scent': 'Mango', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '6.67 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.95 x 2.5 x 0.47 inches; 7.84 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a lovely, light moisturizing gel. The scent is light and fresh like a piece of real mango rather than a candy like, fake scent. I've been using it for for several weeks now and I've found 2 very specific things I like to use it for. First, I have an office job where I type all day and this refreshing gel is a great way to add moisture to my hands without making them so greasy my fingers slip off the keys. Second, I use it as the gel base for my NuFace facial exerciser. You have to use a water based gel to conduct the electric current and this works perfectly! Smells waaay better than the gel you buy from Nuface and is fraction of the price. I can also see this gel as a soothing after sun treatment, even for shaving. I recommend it to everyone. Try it, you'll love it! It's a great product and I'll definitely repurchase! Review Title: Like a fresh mango! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for skincare products focused on anti-aging and skin rejuvenation, highlighted by a consistent engagement with microdermabrasion and serums that promise moisture retention and skin tightening. The consumer displays a positive sentiment toward products with effective exfoliation and deep-cleaning capabilities, as evidenced by high ratings for effective devices and nourishing serums. 

Common themes show an appreciation for multifunctional products; the consumer often finds diverse uses for items, such as a gel that serves both as a moisturizer and a conductive gel for facial devices. Quality is paramount, with an explicit mention of effectiveness justifying the investment, signaling less price sensitivity when considering products that deliver excellent results or convenience.

In terms of preferred product attributes, this individual favors suitable formulations for specific skin types, lightweight textures, pleasant scents, and organic materials. Overall, the core preferences revolve around high-performance skincare solutions that enhance the skincare routine, prioritize quality over cost, and offer an enjoyable user experience.

target_interaction.title: See video! Best dupe EVER!
target_interaction.text: [[VIDEOID:63edc196b50d0c27005584aa4506e390]] Don't just buy one! If you like the genuine Beauty Blender you will feel like you've struck gold with this sponge, it's hands down the BEST dupe if not even superior to the Beauty Blender!
target_interaction.title_meta: Premium Lavenna Cosmetics Original Beauty Makeup Sponge - Latex Free for Blending Liquid Foundation, Concealer, Powder & Cream - 1 Piece Egg Shaped Blender Applicator - Color Purple Teardrop
